page.title: 11Home Life(1)
page.content: Home life has changed a lot in the last twenty years.Now most people have a lot of electrical machines to help them with the housework like washing machines,tumble driers,freezers and fridges for storing food.There are electric mixers and kettles in the kitchen and hoovers to keep the house clean. There are no shops in our area and most people go to the local town of Ross-on-Wye once a week to the supermarkets to buy groceries and frozen foods.There is a market held there twice a week,on Thursday and Saturday.We eat a lot of frozen foods like fish fingers and beefburgers.Our nearest shops are the village stores, which are also post offices,at Linton and Weston-under-Penyard.
